name: Archers
description:
Archers is a third-person, multiplayer game. Queue matches solo, 2 versus 2 or 3 versus 3. Find different types of arrows and use your abilities to eliminate your enemies.

[NO SINGLEPLAYER MODE]

  • Queue matchmaking with your friends or go solo
  • Find Explosive Arrows that sends your enemies flying, or 7 other types of arrows with different behaviours. More arrows planned on being added with time
  • The player has 4 abilities that can be used in combat.
  • Engage in fast-paced close combat or take on your enemies from a distance.
  • More maps and gamemodes planned
